DataElement.preferredName: Eating Disorder Examination Questionnaire Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A broad group of psychological disorders with abnormal eating behaviors leading to physiological effects from overeating or insufficient food intake._An appraisal or evaluation of a patient's condition by a clinician that is based on a physical exam, medical history, and the patient's account of symptoms._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease
